amendment.description: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funding to the Uniting for Ukraine program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
